org.coniks.coniks_server

Class ServerMessaging

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.ServerMessaging

  • public class ServerMessaging
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all of the messaging operations between the server and clients.

    • Method Detail

      • sendSimpleResponseProto

        public static void sendSimpleResponseProto(int reqResult,
                           java.net.Socket socket)
        Sends a simple server response protobuf based on the result (often an error) of a client request.
        Parameters:
        reqResult - the result of the request
        socket - the client socket to which to send the message

      • sendCommitmentProto

        public static void sendCommitmentProto(SignedTreeRoot str,
                       java.net.Socket socket)
        Sends the signed tree root protobuf returned for a client's signed tree root request.
        Parameters:
        str - the signed tree root to send
        socket - the client socket to which to send the message

      • sendRegistrationRespProto

        public static void sendRegistrationRespProto(long regEpoch,
                             int epochInterval,
                             java.net.Socket socket)
        Sends a basic registration response protobuf for a new name-to-key mapping registration.
        Parameters:
        regEpoch - the epoch at which the mapping will be registered in the directory
        epochInterval - the frequency with which the server updates its directory.
        socket - the client socket to which to send the message

      • sendAuthPathProto

        public static void sendAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln,
                     RootNode root,
                     java.net.Socket socket)
        Sends the authentication path protobuf returned for a client's key lookup.
        Parameters:
        uln - the key directory entry for which to send the authentication path
        root - the key directory root for the authentication path
        socket - the client socket to which to send the message

      • receiveMsgProto

        public static com.google.protobuf.AbstractMessage receiveMsgProto(java.net.Socket socket)
        Receives a protobuf message from the client and checks that the message is correctly formatted for the expected message type. The caller is responsible for handling the exact message type(s).
        Parameters:
        socket - the client socket from which the message is coming
        Returns:
        The specific protobuf message according to the message type indicated by the client.

      • listenForRequests

        public static void listenForRequests(boolean isFullOp)
        Listens for incoming requests. Uses an SSL connection if the server is running in full operating mode.
        Parameters:
        isFullOp - indicates whether the client is operating in full mode or in testing mode
